TrafPy Benchmarker
==================

A key advantage of using ``TrafPy`` to generate network traffic is that,
given just a few ``TrafPy`` parameters, you can re-generate any traffic trace for any network.
This therefore profides a standardised method for benchmarking your own network systems.
Useful ``TrafPy`` benchmark generation functionality is provided by the 
``trafpy.benchmarker`` module.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   tutorial_using_default_trafpy_benchmarks
   tutorial_creating_custom_trafpy_benchmarks
   tutorial_overwriting_and_adding_new_default_trafpy_benchmarks
